text: Egha mɨdorozir gumazibar garir gumazir dapanim, uan mɨdorozir gumazir 100plan garir gumazir dapanir pumuningɨn diagha kamaghɨn aning mɨgei, “Gua 200plan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko 70plan mɨdorozir gumazir hoziabagh apiaghira mɨsoziba ko 200plan afuzibar mɨsozir mɨdorozir gumaziba akumakum. Egh ia 9 kloghɨn datɨrɨghɨn dɨmagarimɨn Sisarian mangɨ.
